title: REVIEW: Bring your tissues: HBO Max's “Friends: The Reunion” special brings the six actors from NBC's sitcom together on the stage they made famous. The ensemble jokes and tells backstage stories from filming the sitcom that aired for 10 years on NBC. http://apne.ws/PgRuOIh

RT by @AP: "Romancing the Stone" introduced audiences in 1984 to the crackling chemistry between Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. After two more movies together, the actors reunited for the final season of @Netflix’s "The Kominsky Method." http://apne.ws/laD8Jo3
